actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of Energy, OMB.

actions.text: Subcommittee on Energy Research, Development, Production and Regulation. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 106-377.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Research, Development, Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Energy to convey to the city of Bartlesville, Oklahoma, the former site of the NIPER facility of the Department of Energy.

summary.text: Instructs the Secretary of Energy to convey to the city of Bartlesville, Washington County, Oklahoma, the former site of the National Institute of Petroleum Energy Research.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Energy to convey to the city of Bartlesville, Oklahoma, the former site of the NIPER facility of the Department of Energy.
